welcome: Welcome to MagicCode and enjoy code magic! Coding Class Enrollment is now open!
scratchjr_intro: With ScratchJr, young children can program their own interactive stories and games. In the process, they learn to solve problems, design projects, and express themselves creatively on the computer.
scratch_intro: Scratch is a visual programming language that enables children to create digital stories, games, and animations. Scratch promotes logical and computational thinking, problem solving skills and creativity.
python_intro: Python is the ideal syntax-based programming language for children to learn. It helps them grasp the basic concepts of algorithmics and programming, while immersing them in the culture and specifics of the IT world.
robotics_intro: The micro:bit-based robotics programming courses focus on learning the principles of various sensors and methods of hardware-software collaborative programming, perfectly embodying the STEM education philosophy.
